data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Talk about an important crop in your country.
data.answer: Food crops are harvested and consumed for daily purposes in India. For example, we have fruit crops, vegetable crops, nut crops, spices crops, and grain crops. I would like to talk about how Indian people grow crops. Firstly, grain crops seeds should be planted in the Spring or Autumn. Secondly, we need to get the soil well prepared. Thirdly, we need to water the soil. Finally, we need to wait and see how they grow. India exports different types of crops to other countries, including grain crops.

options.content: Is this crop exported or imported to your country?
